body.raw:
global:
  action: "ignore"
  description: ""
  enable_bgp: "yes"
  enable_ospf: "no"
  area_type: ""
  ospf_area_id: ""

tenant: "test1_tenant"
action: "modified"
l3outs:
- name: "test1_l3out"
  vrf: "test1_vrf"
  l3out_domain: "test2_l3out_dom"
  action: "cfeated,modified"
- name: "test2_l3out"
  vrf: "test2_vrf"
  l3out_domain: "test2_l3out_dom"
  action: "cfeated,modified"

global:
  action: "ignore"
  description: ""

tenant: "test1_tenant"
action: "modified"
l3outs:
- name: "test1_l3out"
  action: "modified"
  l3out_node_profiles:
  - name: "test1_l3out_node_profile"
    action: "created,modified"
    nodes:
    - node_id: 1201
      router_id: 172.16.1.1
      action: "created,modified"
    - node_id: 1202
      action: "created,modified"
      router_id: 172.16.1.2
  - name: "test2_l3out_node_profile"
    action: "created,modified"
    nodes:
    - node_id: 1202
      action: "created,modified"
      router_id: 172.16.1.3
    - node_id: 1203
      action: "created,modified"
      router_id: 172.16.1.4
- name: "test2_l3out"
  action: "modified"
  l3out_node_profiles:
  - name: "test3_l3out_node_profile"
    action: "created,modified"
    nodes:
    - node_id: 1201
      router_id: 172.16.1.1
      action: "created,modified"
    - node_id: 1202
      router_id: 172.16.1.2
      action: "created,modified"
  - name: "test4_l3out_node_profile"
    action: "created,modified"
    nodes:
    - node_id: 1202
      router_id: 172.16.1.3
      action: "created,modified"
    - node_id: 1203
      router_id: 172.16.1.4
      action: "created,modified"

global:
  action: "ignore"
  description: ""
  ospf_interface_policy: ""
  pod_id: ""

tenant: "test1_tenant"
action: "modified"
l3outs:
- name: "test1_l3out"
  action: "modified"
  l3out_node_profiles:
  - name: "test1_l3out_node_profile"
    action: "modified"
    nodes:
    - node_id: 1201
      router_id: "172.16.1.1"
      action: "created,modified"
    - node_id: 1202
      router_id: "172.16.1.2"
      action: "created,modified"
    l3out_int_profilces:
    - name: "test1_l3out_int_profile"
      int_pol_group: "test1_int_pol_group"
      vlan_id: 100
      left_node_id: 1201
      right_node_id: 1202
      svi_1: "10.11.11.2/24"
      svi_2: "10.11.11.3/24"
      action: "created,modified"
